import {differenceInCalenderDays} from 'date-fns' import { useState } from "react" export default function BookingWidget({place}){ const [checkIn,setCheckIn]=useState('') const [checkOut,setCheckOut]=useState('') const [numberOfGuests,setNumberOfGuests]=useState(1) let numberOfDays=0 if(checkIn && checkOut){ numberOfDays=differenceInCalenderDays(new Date(checkOut),new Date(checkIn)) } return(
Price: ${place.price} /per night
setCheckIn(ev.target.value)} >
setCheckOut(ev.target.value)} >
setNumberOfGuests(ev.target.value)} >
) }
